text_block_list.text: The Selection Race was held for trainers to see the abilities of horse girls, which is held only four times a year at the Academy.
the venue was crowded with students, enthusiastic horse girl fans, and many trainers who came to see the race. There is one horse girl that was attracting attention.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: To show great results in the Twinkle series and win at the Tenno Sho race is also my mission as a mejiro family.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For that reason, I have to make sure to leave a great result in this Selection Race…!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Is that a treasured child of the "Mejiro family" who has produced many excellent horse girls? I wonder if she will show me a good run.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She had a good reputation as a great stayer even before she entered Academy. She seems to want to show great results this time as well!
The one that has received the most attention seems to be Mejiro McQueen, a beautiful gray horse girl.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: McQueen-chan! It looks like our group is about to start. Let's Go!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah yes! Thanks for your reminding me, Ms. Ines Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Let's go
Thus, the Selection Race has finally begun!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah, hah, hah…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The race is about to finish! However, the most attention Mejiro McQueen is still behind !!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah… guhh…!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It looks like there is no power in her running. Is she out of stamina?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Well, I thought she was a better stayer, but… I guess I expected too much.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Guuu… uuh…!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She runs so hard, but McQueen doesn't get anywhere!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Ines Fujin at the leading, now……Gooooooooal

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: It was Ines Fujin who won the Selection Race! The big cheers that expect her future surround the venue!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Thank you everyone for your support! Thanks to you, I was able to become number one!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Ines Fujin has good legs. It looks like she will grow a lot better on the training.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I want her to join our team right now.

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: But that rumored child… well, she didn't be as much as I expected.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Such disappointing!
While Ines Fujin gains a lot of attention, Mejiro McQueen's result was 7th, which was not very good.
But…
Suddenly, when I went to see the training course, Mejiro McQueen was running there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha, hah, hah, hah, hah…!! Haa…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Not yet. Not enough yet …

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wow… it really was you! McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, Ryan……… do you have any business with me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: No, it's not any business. I just saw you on the course.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen, don't push yourself too hard! You must be tired from the Selection Race today, right? if you overdo it……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your concern. But I'll keep going a little longer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen… But…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The people who participated in the Selection Race were all more elite than I had imagined.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Tracen Academy is full of elites… I thought I knew it, but I wasn't prepared enough.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But this is not the end! In the next Selection Race, I will definitely recover the honor!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Because I'm a "Mejiro family" horse girl …!
At that time, Mejiro McQueen had a very strong light in her eyes …

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Ara, Isn't here is the expected new trainer!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Today was a Selection Race. But did you have a child you were interested in?
The next day, I decided to go see Mejiro McQueen.
